comments.body:
Why do need to check `onHold.size` here? It doesn't make sense to me. 
I removed these checks and everything worked fine.

>  `showOmnichannel && (inquiries.enabled || onHold.size) && groups.set('Omnichannel', []);`

:top: This is to show the Omnichannel header incase either
   1) only OnHold chats are present or
   2) only Inquiries are present or
   3) only chats of both these types of room are present
------------------------------------------------------
> showOmnichannel && (inquiries.enabled || onHold.size) && omnichannel.size && groups.set('Open_Livechats', omnichannel);

:top: `onHold.size` is needed here to make sure that if there are open chats (aka in progress chats) and on-hold chats, then the `Chat in progress header` is visible - so we're able to differentiate between on-hold and in-progress chats
